events.message: I am reporting a vehicle collision that occurred on Main Street at 7:45 AM today involving my car and another vehicle.
The claim has been categorized as an Auto Accident based on the description of the collision and damage to the vehicle.
An agent experienced in auto accident claims has been assigned to manage this case and coordinate the investigation.
Your claim has been received and acknowledged. We are committed to handling your case as efficiently as possible.
Please provide the police report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and a copy of your insurance policy for further processing.
All requested documents have been submitted including the accident report and photos of the damage to my car.
Investigation into the cause of the collision and extent of vehicle damage has officially commenced.
The investigation into the auto accident has been completed after reviewing all evidence and witness statements.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the assessment of the damage and liability from the accident.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with claim handling so far.
The claim has been formally approved following agreement on the proposed settlement amount.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount has been issued to the claimant for the vehicle repairs.
The claim has been closed successfully following issuance of payment and confirmation from the claimant.
All records and documentation related to the auto accident claim have been archived in the system.
